flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=310>>310
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $310 / 2 = $<<310/2=155>>155
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $155 + $10 = $<<155+10=165>>165 to the shelter.
#### 165

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 310. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
